sn48.44:1.2: ekam samayam bhagava savatthiyam viharati pubbakotthake.
sn48.44:1.3: Tatra kho bhagava ayasmantam sariputtam amantesi:
sn48.44:1.5: saddhindriyam bhavitam bahulikatam amatogadham hoti amataparayanam amatapariyosanam …pe… pannindriyam bhavitam bahulikatam amatogadham hoti amataparayanam amatapariyosanan”ti?
sn48.44:2.1: “Na khvaham ettha, bhante, bhagavato saddhaya gacchami—
sn48.44:2.2: saddhindriyam …pe… pannindriyam bhavitam bahulikatam amatogadham hoti amataparayanam amatapariyosanam.
sn48.44:2.3: Yesanhetam, bhante, annatam assa adittham aviditam asacchikatam aphassitam pannaya, te tattha paresam saddhaya gaccheyyum—
sn48.44:2.4: saddhindriyam …pe… pannindriyam bhavitam bahulikatam amatogadham hoti amataparayanam amatapariyosanam.
sn48.44:2.5: Yesanca kho etam, bhante, natam dittham viditam sacchikatam phassitam pannaya, nikkankha te tattha nibbicikiccha—
sn48.44:2.6: saddhindriyam …pe… pannindriyam bhavitam bahulikatam amatogadham hoti amataparayanam amatapariyosanam.
sn48.44:2.7: Mayhanca kho etam, bhante, natam dittham viditam sacchikatam phassitam pannaya.
sn48.44:2.8: Nikkankhvaham tattha nibbicikiccho saddhindriyam …pe… pannindriyam bhavitam bahulikatam amatogadham hoti amataparayanam amatapariyosanan”ti.
sn48.44:3.2: Yesanhetam, sariputta, annatam assa adittham aviditam asacchikatam aphassitam pannaya, te tattha paresam saddhaya gaccheyyum—
sn48.44:3.3: saddhindriyam bhavitam bahulikatam amatogadham hoti amataparayanam amatapariyosanam …pe… pannindriyam bhavitam bahulikatam amatogadham hoti amataparayanam amatapariyosanam.
sn48.44:3.4: Yesanca kho etam, sariputta, natam dittham viditam sacchikatam phassitam pannaya, nikkankha te tattha nibbicikiccha—
sn48.44:3.5: saddhindriyam bhavitam bahulikatam amatogadham hoti amataparayanam amatapariyosanam …pe… pannindriyam bhavitam bahulikatam amatogadham hoti amataparayanam amatapariyosanan”ti.
